Responsive, quick and friendly customer service from end-to-end!
Transparent pricing and our quality assurance.
Beautiful, high-quality Fence & Concretes for your property built by skilled local craftsmen.

Yelp.title: Very happy with the work and the quality of the new fence. Ergeon's communications with their PM and Construction Manager was excellent. Their split costing process with my neighbors made it easy for me; I just had to pay for my share, and my neighbors dealt directly with Ergeon. Thank you Ergeon!
Yelp.name: Alan L.

Google.title: My family used Ergeon to replace our redwood fence. The entire Ergeon staff team from the gentleman who provided the quote, the scheduling and billing support Oscar & Joan and the work crew were a pleasure to work with (very professional, responsive, respectful and outstanding). The fence was completed without a hitch, including cleaning of the work site and removal of all debris as promised. I will certainly use Ergeon in the future and highly recommend them to everyone looking for a fence and driveway contractor.
Google.name: Craig C.
Google.description: The fence was completed without a hitch, including cleaning of the work site and removal of all debris as promised.

faq.corner-lot-rules:
No fence, wall, hedge, or other visual obstruction over thirty (30) inches in height
above the nearest street curb elevation shall be erected, placed, planted, or allowed to grow within a Traffic Visibility Area.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.
